personal.name: Minimalistic Java debugger
personal.description: An implementation of a Java debugger using the Java Debugger Interface (JDI).

personal.name: Rewrite Tools Set
personal.description: This set of tools offers advanced search capabilities and complex code transformations using Pharo's refactoring engine.

personal.description: An implementation of the ray traveling salesman problem using genetic algorithms.

personal.description: An implementation of the ray tracing algorithm in C++.

work.name: Illimani Memory Profiler
work.description: A robust and complete memory profiler for Pharo. It is also a memory profiler framework that allows to create custom memory profilers.

work.name: XTDD AI exercises
work.description: AI exercises to be implemented using Debugger-Driven-Development. Which is like TDD but creating and compiling the methods inside the debugger.

work.name: pharo-ai
work.description: I was one of the lead developers of pharo-ai. I implemented and worked on libraries for machine learning algorithms, statistical metrics, and data preprocessing.

work.name: Graph algorithms
work.description: Implementation of several graph algorithms using OOP practices.
